item.title: c10k of tokio-rs network
item.description: server benchmark-client Benchmark v.0.1 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 -> % target/release/examples/echo_client -t 2 -c 100 -l 100 -a 127.0.0.1:3941 ==================Benchmarking: 127.0.0.1:3941================== 100 clients, running 100 bytes, 10 sec.
